title: Intensive Workshop on Enrichment Tasks for Developing Mathematical Potential

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and understanding of elementary mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Group interaction-centered educational environment using smartphone-based VR simulation, focusing on developing mathematical potential linked to current practitioners' job tasks

learning_goals: Mathematically model real-world problems to derive solutions
Reflect on and improve their mathematical thinking processes through peer feedback and instructor observation
Design and apply creative problem-solving strategies in VR simulation environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
